name: 陳晏笙
objective:
1.	Antenna fundamentals
2.	Circuit parameters
3.	Impedance matching networks
4.	Radiation parameters
5.	Array fundamentals
6.	Antenna family
7.	Special topics
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Antenna fundamentals: system overview
Week 3: Antenna fundamentals: radiation mechanism
Week 4: Circuit parameters: transmission line theory
Week 5: Circuit parameters: frequency-domain analysis
Week 6: Spring Break
Week 7: Circuit parameters: lossy transmission lines
Week 8: Impedance matching networks: the use of lumped elements
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Impedance matching networks: the use of distributed elements
Week 11: Radiation parameters: polarization and pattern
Week 12: Radiation parameters: directivity, efficiency, and gain
Week 13: Array fundamentals: two-element array
Week 14: Array fundamentals: N-element array
Week 15: Array fundamentals: synthesis
Week 16: Antenna family
Week 17: Final
scorePolicy: Dynamic Grading System (DGS) with a final exam, a hand-on project, two quizzes, and several in-class activies.
materials:
Texts
1.	Lecture notes available for download from 北科 i 學園

References
1.	D. M. Pozar, Microwave Engineering, 4th ed., Wiley, 2011.
2.	J. Kraus and R. Marhefka, Antennas: For All Application, 3rd Edition, McGraw-Hill, 2001.
3.	S. R. Saunders and A. Aragon-Zavala, Antennas and Propagation for Wireless Communication Systems, 2nd Edition, McGraw-Hill, 2007.
